minimumCandidates.title: Minimum number of candidates
minimumCandidates.description: The minimum number of candidates to be invited for the second stage of the procedure. If there is an exact limit on the number of candidates, set `minimumCandidates` and `maximumCandidates` to the same number.

maximumCandidates.title: Maximum number of candidates

successiveReduction.title: Successive reduction
successiveReduction.description: The procedure will take place in successive stages. In each stage, some participants might be eliminated.

noNegotiationNecessary.title: No negotiation necessary
noNegotiationNecessary.description: The buyer or procuring entity reserves the right to award the contract on the basis of the initial bids without any further negotiations.

invitationDate.title: Invitation date
